overview: She was an expectant mother, but she endured every hardship these seasoned soldiers experienced.  Without her, the Corps of Discovery would have failed.  This program re-enacts her journey in her own words.  Taken captive as a child during a raid, adopted into the tribe of her captors, and then married off, her adventures have only just begun.
tagline: The most important expedition in US history might have failed but for the heroism of this teenage girl.
title: Sacagawea
